content.p: Alva Productions Internship Programme Description: Alva Productions is a video production company located in Iskandar City, Johor. Currently, we are offering work at home or office internship programme to students in media fields. Alva Productions provides professional commercial video and corporate video for our clients. We implement strategies to produce creative video for marketing, branding, and creating awareness for any business, services or products. As a video productions house, we bring forth our expertise in creative concept and unique video content. From providing detailed concept, script, planning, shoot, and edit to fulfil client's expectations. Available internships - Video production: Application: To apply, kindly send your application letter and resume to info@alvaproductions.com.my. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
